verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Venteso 'zao rankizy
'Lay hira maminao.
Fa tia zaza Izy
Jesosy Tomponao.
Derao ka ifalio
Fa mendrika Azy 'zany.
Lazao ka ihobio
'Zany fitiavan-dehibe.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Ianao ry tanora
Tiany ho sakaizany
Ka tonga izao ny ora
Hanompoana Azy izao
Avia, Ã´ malakia,
Fa maro ny adidy
Efao, eny vitao
Ny asa nekenao.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Ianao no olom-bery
Tiany havotana.
Tsy foiny ho irery
Ny ota, loza anie.
Ialao ny ota anio
Manimba ny fanahy
Ekeo ka mba fidio
Jeso Mpanafaka.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Isika novonjena
Mba miezaha re
Hanampy tsy terena
Ny olo-marobe
Torio, eny lazao
Izay tsy mbola nandre
Torio, eny ambarao
'Lay fitiavan-dehibe.
